article_title: The latest updates from Israel and Gaza.
sentence: A  funeral  for  one  of  the  hostages  mistakenly  killed  by  the  IDF  on  Friday  has  taken  place  in  central  Israel.

article_title: The latest updates from Israel and Gaza.
sentence: Alon  Shamriz  was  mis-identified  as  a  "threat"  by  an  Israeli  soldier,  along  with  hostages  Yotam  Haim  and  Samer  Talalka  who  were  also  killed.
